name: Buddha-Bar Hotel Prague

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PROS: The decor and music are fantastic and create a really funky and relaxed atmosphere. Whch is the main selling point of this hotel. It's certainly unique and we would recommend it to others.
reviews.title: Fantastic Atmosphere, comfortable rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You can play the buddha bar music throughout the room and change the lighting to suit the mood. The bed was very comfortable, it felt a bit like a futon, and they offer a pillow menu. Staff were lovely and very helpful. The cold breakfast was fantastic and although we didn't use the bar it looked great.
reviews.title: very good

reviews.text: Also, the room was extremely spacious with a fantastic bath, tv in the bathroom, large shower, separate toilet and its own buddha!
reviews.title: An Oasis
Siddharta cafe - looks great but food is awful.
reviews.text: CONS: We really enjoyed this hotel but there were just a few minor things worth mentioning.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - We didn't like the complexity of the light switches, there were far too many switches!
reviews.title: Might have been the best hotel I've ever stayed in!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel to stay in. Close to the city center and the rooms look pretty porno, so dont take your kids ;) Friendly staff which is not usual for this city. Very nice bathroom and nice hotel bar. All I can say is try it out, cuz you will like it!
reviews.title: Very sexy rooms, high standard boutique hotel and friendly service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I visited the hotel with my fiance for a 5 day surprise for her 40th , the staff were great really friendly and nothing was to much for them . the rooms are huge and if its style you want this is the place to go . 5min walk and you are in the old town square so you can walk anywhere . we eat in the restraunt on our last night and the food was superb . the room are full of gadgets remote controls for everything including all curtains so if you find yourself opening the curtains instead of changing the tv channel dont be surprised , on that note my only fault was there was no british channels only sky news . we booked a car through the hotel to pick us up on arrival and this was great really classy car and great driver , will be going back to this hotel in the future , overall a great hotel which is luxury at its best . thanks for a great time guys .
reviews.title: great hotel great location

reviews.text: jim & julie scotland may 2011
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great athmosphere, sexy and very trendy. Excellent service, nice staff. Dream location for romantic escapes.
reviews.title: Ideal Hotel in Ideal Location in Ideal City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very pleased with my 6 night stay at this lovely and charming hotel. The location was fantastic--on a quiet street within close proximity (i.e. between 2-10 minute walk) to most areas I spent the majority of my time at while in Prague. The entire staff was first rate, pleasant, and accomodating. The room was simply magnificient--state of the art creature comforts and attention to detail. I particularly looked forward to the evening turn down service that included truffles and quiche as well as the Bang and Olufson entertainment system that included wonderful Buddha Bar soundtracks. This is a true boutique hotel with a limited number of rooms that assures guests they will receive prompt attention from the front desk for any and all needs.
reviews.title: Like a dream

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The least liked amenity were the light switches in our room, and the bath needed a grab bar.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Otherwise, the hotel was excellent. The room was always clean and well appointed, including the welcome treat placed on the bed each evening.
reviews.title: Great hotel, perfect location, great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were always respecful and courteous. The reception staff organised tickets and seats for the operas, and got us the best seats.
reviews.title: Fantastic rooms, and best local in Old Town

reviews.text: The reception staff also orgranised transport and showed us exact directions when we walked to our destinations. We swere there for two weeks
reviews.title: Just one problem...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are a mature couple, and this hotel was a great start for our journey.
reviews.title: Loved the atmosphere and good service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: what a hotel, i dont htink this property needs any review, any rating, no talks. one should just go and wrap your self in the most stunning rooms this hotel has to offer. thankfully we were there only for a night else we would have not done any sight seeing as we would not feel like getting out of our room. it has everything you need to make a perfect romatic getaway. I would not like to describe further and kill the experience. Be there to feel it!!!
reviews.title: TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE, A MUST STAY!!!

reviews.text: I was in Frankfurt for a conference and was taking a flight from Budapest to Asia. I have never been to Prague and decided to stop over for 2 nights.
reviews.title: UNIQUE EXPERIENCE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The interiors of the hotel gave me the impression of an old Chinese opium house. It reminds me of the movie "The Last Emperor". The decoration is done in excellent details.
reviews.title: Great Staff - Poor Sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room is comfortable and thoughtful with nice amenities. They use B&O television and SubZero refrigerators although the fridge is quite noisy and did bother me a bit. Bathroom is large with nice big tub and separate shower stall. I really do not have anything to complain about the bathroom.
reviews.title: Like staying in a thoughtful, deliciously romantic work of art

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great ambience in the restaurant and bar. However, I would only describe their food as sub-PF Chang quality.
reviews.title: Wonderful romantic break

description: The Buddha-Bar Hotel Prague represents the first property of the new Buddha-Bar Hotels & Resorts chain inspired by the legendary Buddha-Bar brand.Trendy hotel concept goes beyond expectations to ensure a relaxing andrejuvenating experience through its mystical fusion, exquisite designs, highlypersonalized services, state-of-the-art technologies, top-end amenities andculinary delights served in 2 unique “eatmosphere“ venues - Buddha-Barand Siddharta Café.
